modShortDescription: It is a small mod based on the work of Ragsy2145, which gives you the possibility to harvest the vehicleWheels by destroying from the floor.
modDescription:
**v1.1**

It is a small mod based on the work of Ragsy2145, which gives you the possibility to harvest the vehicleWheels by destroying from the floor, they will give you:

1. vehicleWheels count = 1 prob = 0.14
2. resourceForgedSteel count = 1 prob = 0.12
3. resourceOil count = 1 prob = 0.14
4. resourceScrapPolymers count = 6 prob = 0.75

They only change the values of vehicleWheels for decoCarTirePile and decoCarTireStack which can give you 1 to 2 wheels.

**v1.2**

It gives you the possibility to obtain decoCarTireSmallFlat to make vehicleWheels and adds its recipe (the original recipe remains).

```
        <drop event="Destroy" name="decoCarTireSmallFlat" count="1" prob="0.20" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
        <drop event="Destroy" name="resourceForgedSteel" count="1" prob="0.12" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
        <drop event="Destroy" name="resourceOil" count="1" prob="0.14" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
        <drop event="Destroy" name="resourceScrapPolymers" count="6" prob="0.16" tag="salvageHarvest"/>
```

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/v0bx3ts6zxuw5jb/GK_Useful_Tires_A19.rar/file)** v1.1  
**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/zx95oxovl8xm3vq/GK_Useful_Tires_A19%25282%2529.rar/file)** v1.2

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20168-gouki%C2%B4s-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Gouki](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gouki/), Ragsy2145
